code: import React,{useState}from'react';import"./Card.css";import plug from"../../../images/plug.svg";import favIconR from"../../../images/favorite_r.svg";import favIconW from"../../../images/favorite_w.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Card(_ref){let{data,hendlerFav,hendlerShoppingCart}=_ref;const[isFav,setIsFav]=useState(false);const[isShoppingCart,setIsShoppingCart]=useState(false);const picture=data.picture?data.picture:plug;const favIcon=isFav?favIconR:favIconW;function changeFav(card){hendlerFav(card);setIsFav(!isFav);};function changeShoppingCart(card){hendlerShoppingCart(card);setIsShoppingCart(!isShoppingCart);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__title",children:data.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"card__button_add_favourites",onClick:()=>changeFav(data),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:favIcon,alt:"icon"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"card__img",src:picture,alt:"\u0444\u043E\u0442\u043E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"card__quantity",children:["\u043D\u0430 \u0441\u043A\u043B\u0430\u0434\u0435 ",data.quantity," \u0448\u0442"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"card__price",children:[data.price," \u20BD"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"card__button_add_shopping-cart",disabled:data.quantity===0?'diasabled':'',onClick:()=>{changeShoppingCart(data);},children:isShoppingCart?'Удалить из корзины':'В корзину'})]})]});}
